title: Forbidden Soul
description: ‘Bound not by blood but loyalty.We live, we ride, and we dieby our own laws’ I found my place with the Soul’sI’m the one who keeps his calm,the Prez’s Sgt in Arms, and unbeaten in the ring.I was happy. I thought I had it all… Until I saw her.Pure, and innocent, pretty, and sweet.She’s everything I’m not, and everything I want.But she belongs to the tribe who hate us…The girl is forbidden.But that only makes her more desirable.When the Souls become the only ones who can save her tribe.I step up to the challenge.And I won’t go down without a fight.
